explains: n. 焦虑不安；煽动，鼓动；（液体的）搅动
wordGroup: thermal agitation 热骚动；剧烈振荡

sentences.en: Dot arrived in a state of great agitation.
sentences.cn: 多特到达时十分焦虑不安。

sentences.en: He made no attempt to disguise his agitation.
Dina lit a cigarette, trying to mask her agitation.
sentences.cn: 黛娜点燃了一支烟，试图掩饰她的不安。
